answers.answer: A cookie is a small file stored on an internet-enabled device, installed upon a server's request to a browser. It facilitates internet access by personalizing settings such as language, country, or displayed prices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What is a cookie?'.

answers.answer: Cookies are categorized as "Session cookies," which are temporarily stored until the user leaves the website or closes the browser, and "Persistent Cookies," which are stored for a predetermined length of time on a hard drive.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What is a cookie?'.

answers.answer: Third-party cookies are placed by a different website than the one currently being visited, often through banners or links. They can anonymously track a userâ€™s interests to allow them to receive more relevant advertisements.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What are cookies placed by third parties?'.

answers.answer: Cookies offer the benefit of connecting users to specific websites, allowing the browser to react accordingly upon return visits. They also help generate a user-friendly browsing experience tailored to individual preferences and interests.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What are the advantages of cookies?'.

answers.answer: A cookie's lifespan can end after a single browsing session when the user leaves the website, or permanent cookies can be retained but can also be deleted by the user at any time.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What is the lifespan of a cookie?'.

answers.answer: Cookies store information in a small text file that allows a website to recognize a browser. This includes important information that improves the Internet browsing experience, such as an order number for a donation.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'What type of information is stored and accessed through cookies?'.

answers.answer: Cookies are central to the efficient functioning of the Internet by helping to generate a user-friendly browsing experience tailored to each user's preferences and interests.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'Why are cookies important to the Internet?'.

answers.answer: Cookies can be used as a form of spyware by storing user preferences and browsing history across multiple sites. Additionally, information in cookies can be intercepted if transmitted over unencrypted networks or used by attackers due to server misconfigurations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'Security and privacy issues'.

answers.answer: Users can adjust their browser's integrated privacy settings, typically found in the 'options' or 'preferences' menu, to control cookie acceptance levels, validity periods, and automatic deletion after visiting a site.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'How can I stop cookies?'.

answers.answer: If cookies are rejected or disabled, some websites may become unusable, impractical, or difficult to visit and use. While users will still receive online advertising, it will no longer be tailored to their preferences or browsing behavior.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'How can I stop cookies?'.

answers.answer: Cookies are used for visitor analysis when third-party analytics software generates a user analytics cookie. This cookie tracks if a user has visited the site before and how often unique users visit, solely for statistical purposes without identifying individuals.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'How are cookies used by this website?'.

answers.answer: Users should customize browser cookie settings for comfortable security, consider deleting browsing data after each session if sharing a computer, and install/constantly update antispyware applications. Additionally, ensuring the browser is always up to date is crucial for safe browsing.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/cookie-policy and read the section under 'Tips for safe and responsible browsing, based on cookies'.
